title: Premium SaaS UI upgrade request (already implemented by existing features)
constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only UI component sources must be composed, not edited).
Keep all user-facing text in English.
Maintain the global constraint: no file upload inputs or backend endpoints.
Backend must remain single-actor (all Motoko logic in backend/main.mo); only add migration.mo if state upgrade is required.
nonGoals: Add new product features beyond the requested UI/UX upgrades (e.g., new pages, new workflows, new backend models/APIs).
Introduce third-party auth providers (only Internet Identity is supported).
Add real-time communication via WebSockets (polling only).
